<h3 id="X30384">X(30384) = ENDO-HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: ANTI-WASAT AND TRINH</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (b+c)*a^3+(b^2-4*b*c+c^2)*a^2-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a-(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(30384) = 3*X(36)-X(15228) = X(36)-3*X(16173) = X(484)-3*X(3582) = X(908)+2*X(21630) = 4*X(1387)-X(21578) = X(1512)-4*X(16174) = X(1737)-4*X(7743) = 3*X(3582)-2*X(3911) = 5*X(3616)-3*X(4881) = 2*X(5122)-3*X(5298) = X(15228)-9*X(16173) = 5*X(18493)-X(18524)</b>
<p>
The homothetic center of these triangles is X(21663). X(30384) is their endo-homothetic center only when ABC is acute.</p>
<p>X(30384) lies on these lines:

{30383,30434}</p>
<p>
X(30384) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1, 3583}, {149, 4511}, {1320, 5176}, {2077, 14217}, {3218, 5180}, {11813, 21630}<br>
X(30384) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (11, 7743), (484, 3911), (908, 11813), (1145, 5123), (1155, 15325), (1319, 1387), (1519, 946), (1532, 22835), (1737, 11), (6735, 3814), (11570, 5570), (15326, 5126), (17757, 5087), (21578, 1319)<br>
X(30384) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 1479, 10572), (1, 4857, 950), (1, 9614, 1479)<br>
</p>
